AUTH0_API_AUDIENCE.description: Auth0 audience value for this API server

AUTH0_CLIENT_ID.description: Auth0 client ID. This server is both a audience (API server) and a API consumer with a client ID

AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Auth0 client secret for the given client ID

AUTH0_ISSUER.description: Auth0 trusted issuer URL for RSA verification of JWT token

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS secret access key ID used to access DynamoDB and S3

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key used to access DynamoDB and S3

CLOUDAMQP_URL.description: RabbitMQ URL use to communicate between web and worker processes

ELASTICHSEARCH_AUTHORIZATION.description: Authorization Header used to authenticate with Elasticsearch cluster
